Text: Account Update from Capital OneCapital One Statement Notification As a valued customer of our Online Account Services each month you will receive an email notification that your current statement is available online Your statement is available at To access your statement login and click the My Statement link at the top of the screen Thank you for using Capital Ones Online Account Services Best Regards Capital One Services Take advantage of the latest financial products and services Just go to the links below Home Loans Need help getting a home loan Thinking about refinancing Go to YARTCCA Insurance Paying too much for auto or term life insurance Go to YARTCCA Credit Reports Access your credit report Go to YARTCCA Auto Loans Get a loan that suits you then take it straight to the dealership Go to YARTCCA Auto Refinance See if you can save money on your auto loan Refinance Today Go to YARTCCA c Capital One Services Inc Capital One is a federally registered service mark All rights reserved
